content:
ReliableStateManager ReliableStateManager Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.dll

Manages all IReliableState for a service replica. Each replica in a service has its own state manager and thus its own set of IReliableState.

Edit

In this Article

public class ReliableStateManager : IReliableStateManagerReplica, IStateProviderReplica, IReliableStateManager, IAsyncEnumerable<IReliableState>Public Class ReliableStateManager
    Implements IReliableStateManagerReplica, IStateProviderReplica, IReliableStateManager, IAsyncEnumerable(Of IReliableState)
Inheritance
ObjectObject
ReliableStateManagerReliableStateManager

Parameters
serviceContext
StatefulServiceContext StatefulServiceContext

A StatefulServiceContext that describes the service context.

configuration
ReliableStateManagerConfiguration ReliableStateManagerConfiguration

Configuration parameters.

Properties

OnDataLossAsync OnDataLossAsync

Edit

Set this property to receive notification when this IStateProviderReplica suspects data loss.

public Func<CancellationToken, Task<bool>> OnDataLossAsync { set; }Public WriteOnly Property OnDataLossAsync As Func(Of CancellationToken, Task(Of Boolean))
Value
Func<CancellationToken, Task<Boolean>> Func(Of CancellationToken, Task(Of Boolean))

Function called as part of suspected data loss processing.

Remarks

OnDataLossAsync function takes in CancellationToken and needs to return a Task that represents the asynchronous processing of the event. Returning true indicates that the reliable state manager's state has been restored. Returning false indicates that the reliable state manager's state has not been changed.

The passed delegate should monitor the given cancellation token for cancellation requests.

Methods

BackupAsync(BackupOption, TimeSpan, CancellationToken, Func<BackupInfo, CancellationToken, Task<Boolean>>) BackupAsync(BackupOption, TimeSpan, CancellationToken, Func(Of BackupInfo, CancellationToken, Task(Of Boolean)))

Edit

Performs a backup of all reliable state managed by this IReliableStateManager.

public Task BackupAsync(BackupOption option, TimeSpan timeout, CancellationToken cancellationToken, Func<BackupInfo, CancellationToken, Task<bool>> backupCallback)Public Function BackupAsync(option As BackupOption, timeout As TimeSpan, cancellationToken As CancellationToken, backupCallback As Func(Of BackupInfo, CancellationToken, Task(Of Boolean))) As Task
Parameters
option
BackupOption BackupOption

The type of backup to perform.

timeout
TimeSpan TimeSpan

The timeout for this operation.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

backupCallback
Func<BackupInfo, CancellationToken, Task<Boolean>> Func(Of BackupInfo, CancellationToken, Task(Of Boolean))

Callback to be called when the backup folder has been created locally and is ready to be moved out of the node.

Returns
Task Task

Task that represents the asynchronous backup operation.

Remarks

Boolean returned by the backupCallback indicate whether the service was able to successfully move the backup folder to an external location. If false is returned, BackupAsync throws InvalidOperationException with the relevant message indicating backupCallback returned false. Also, backup will be marked as unsuccessful.

BackupAsync(Func<BackupInfo, CancellationToken, Task<Boolean>>) BackupAsync(Func(Of BackupInfo, CancellationToken, Task(Of Boolean)))

Edit

Performs a full backup of all reliable state managed by this IReliableStateManager.

public Task BackupAsync(Func<BackupInfo, CancellationToken, Task<bool>> backupCallback)Public Function BackupAsync(backupCallback As Func(Of BackupInfo, CancellationToken, Task(Of Boolean))) As Task
Parameters
backupCallback
Func<BackupInfo, CancellationToken, Task<Boolean>> Func(Of BackupInfo, CancellationToken, Task(Of Boolean))

Callback to be called when the backup folder has been created locally and is ready to be moved out of the node.

Returns
Task Task

Task that represents the asynchronous backup operation.

Remarks

A FULL backup will be performed with a one-hour timeout. Boolean returned by the backupCallback indicate whether the service was able to successfully move the backup folder to an external location. If false is returned, BackupAsync throws InvalidOperationException with the relevant message indicating backupCallback returned false. Also, backup will be marked as unsuccessful.

Edit

Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.

public IAsyncEnumerator<IReliableState> GetAsyncEnumerator()Public Function GetAsyncEnumerator As IAsyncEnumerator(Of IReliableState)
Returns
IAsyncEnumerator<IReliableState> IAsyncEnumerator(Of IReliableState)

An IAsyncEnumerator<T> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.

RestoreAsync(String) RestoreAsync(String)

Edit

Restore a backup taken by BackupAsync(Func<BackupInfo, CancellationToken, Task<Boolean>>) or BackupAsync(BackupOption, TimeSpan, CancellationToken, Func<BackupInfo, CancellationToken, Task<Boolean>>).

public Task RestoreAsync(string backupFolderPath)Public Function RestoreAsync(backupFolderPath As String) As Task
Parameters
backupFolderPath
String String

The directory where the replica is to be restored from. This parameter cannot be null, empty or contain just whitespace. UNC paths may also be provided.

Returns
Task Task

Task that represents the asynchronous restore operation.

Remarks

A safe backup will be performed, meaning the restore will only be completed if the data to restore is ahead of state of the current replica.

RestoreAsync(String, RestorePolicy, CancellationToken) RestoreAsync(String, RestorePolicy, CancellationToken)

Edit

Restore a backup taken by BackupAsync(Func<BackupInfo, CancellationToken, Task<Boolean>>) or BackupAsync(BackupOption, TimeSpan, CancellationToken, Func<BackupInfo, CancellationToken, Task<Boolean>>).

public Task RestoreAsync(string backupFolderPath, RestorePolicy restorePolicy, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Public Function RestoreAsync(backupFolderPath As String, restorePolicy As RestorePolicy, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task
Parameters
backupFolderPath
String String

The directory where the replica is to be restored from. This parameter cannot be null, empty or contain just whitespace. UNC paths may also be provided.

restorePolicy
RestorePolicy RestorePolicy

The restore policy.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task Task

Task that represents the asynchronous restore operation.

Explicit Interface Implementations

IReliableStateManager.CreateTransaction() Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.IReliableStateManager.CreateTransaction()

Edit

Create and start a new transaction that can be used to group operations to be performed atomically.

ITransaction IReliableStateManager.CreateTransaction()Function Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.IReliableStateManager.CreateTransaction As ITransaction Implements IReliableStateManager.CreateTransaction
Returns
ITransaction ITransaction

A new transaction.

Remarks

Operations are added to the transaction by passing the ITransaction object in to reliable state methods.

IReliableStateManager.GetOrAddAsync<T>(ITransaction, String) Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.IReliableStateManager.GetOrAddAsync(Of T)(ITransaction, String)

Edit

Gets an IReliableState of the given type T and with the given name if it exists, or creates one and returns it if it doesn't already exist.

Task<T> IReliableStateManager.GetOrAddAsync<T>(ITransaction tx, string name)where T : IReliableStateFunction Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.IReliableStateManager.GetOrAddAsync(Of T As IReliableState)(tx As ITransaction, name As String) As Task(Of T) Implements IReliableStateManager.GetOrAddAsync
Parameters
tx
ITransaction ITransaction

Transaction to associate this operation with.

name
String String

The name of the IReliableState. This name must be unique in this IReliableStateManager across IReliableState types, including unrelated types.

Returns
Task<T> Task(Of T)

Task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result is the reliable state instance.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException ArgumentNullException

tx is null, or name is null.

ArgumentException ArgumentException

An instance of the type T cannot be created, or the existing IReliableState instance is not of type T.

TimeoutException TimeoutException

The operation failed to complete within the default timeout.

FabricNotPrimaryException FabricNotPrimaryException

Thrown when the is not in .

InvalidOperationException InvalidOperationException

Thrown when a method call is invalid for the object's current state. Example, transaction used is already terminated: committed or aborted.

FabricObjectClosedException FabricObjectClosedException

Indicates that the Reliable State Manager is closed.

Remarks

This is an atomic operation. When an IReliableState needs to be created, it will either complete and return successfully or it will not be created. If this method throws an exception, the transaction must be aborted.

The amount of time to wait for the operation to complete before throwing a TimeoutException. Primarily used to prevent deadlocks. The default is 4 seconds.

Task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result is the reliable state instance.

The operation failed to complete within the given timeout.

Thrown when a method call is invalid for the object's current state. Example, transaction used is already terminated: committed or aborted.

Remarks

This is an atomic operation. When an IReliableState needs to be created, it will either complete and return successfully or it will not be created. If this method throws an exception, the transaction must be aborted.

IReliableStateManager.RemoveAsync(ITransaction, String) Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.IReliableStateManager.RemoveAsync(ITransaction, String)

Edit

Removes the IReliableState with the given name from this state manager. The state is permanently removed from persistent storage and all replicas when the transaction is committed.

Task IReliableStateManager.RemoveAsync(ITransaction tx, string name)Function Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.IReliableStateManager.RemoveAsync(tx As ITransaction, name As String) As Task Implements IReliableStateManager.RemoveAsync
Parameters
tx
ITransaction ITransaction

Transaction to associate this operation with.

name
String String

The name of the IReliableState to remove.

Returns
Task Task

Task that represents the asynchronous remove operation.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException ArgumentNullException

tx is null, or name is null.

ArgumentException ArgumentException

An IReliableState with the given name does not exist.

TimeoutException TimeoutException

The operation failed to complete within the default timeout.

FabricNotPrimaryException FabricNotPrimaryException

Thrown when the is not in .

InvalidOperationException InvalidOperationException

Thrown when a method call is invalid for the object's current state. Example, transaction used is already terminated: committed or aborted.

FabricObjectClosedException FabricObjectClosedException

Indicates that the Reliable State Manager is closed.

Remarks

This is an atomic operation. The IReliableState will be successfully removed along with all state or be left in-tact. If this method throws an exception, the transaction must be aborted.

Thrown when the is not in .

FabricObjectClosedException FabricObjectClosedException

Indicates that the Reliable State Manager is closed.

Remarks

This is an atomic operation. The IReliableState will be successfully removed along with all state or be left in-tact.

Edit

Adds a state serializer. Adds it for all reliable collection instances.

bool IReliableStateManager.TryAddStateSerializer<T>(IStateSerializer<T> stateSerializer)Function Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.IReliableStateManager.TryAddStateSerializer(Of T)(stateSerializer As IStateSerializer(Of T)) As Boolean Implements IReliableStateManager.TryAddStateSerializer

The state serializer to be added.

Returns
Boolean Boolean

True if the serializer was added. False if a serailizer is already registered.

Remarks

This method can only be called in InitializeStateSerializers. Instance specific state serializers always take precedence.

IStateProviderReplica.Abort() Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.IStateProviderReplica.Abort()

Edit

Forcefully abort the state provider replica.

void IStateProviderReplica.Abort()Sub Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.IStateProviderReplica.Abort Implements IStateProviderReplica.Abort

Remarks

This generally occurs when a permanent fault is detected on the node, or when Service Fabric cannot reliably manage the replica's lifecycle due to internal failures.

IStateProviderReplica.CloseAsync(CancellationToken) Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.IStateProviderReplica.CloseAsync(CancellationToken)

Edit

Gracefully close the state provider replica.

Task IStateProviderReplica.CloseAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken)Function Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.IStateProviderReplica.CloseAsync(cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task Implements IStateProviderReplica.CloseAsync
Parameters
cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task Task

Task that represents the asynchronous close operation.

Remarks

This generally occurs when the replica's code is being upgrade, the replica is being moved due to load balancing, or a transient fault is detected.

IStateProviderReplica.Initialize(StatefulServiceInitializationParameters) Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.IStateProviderReplica.Initialize(StatefulServiceInitializationParameters)

Edit

Initialize the state provider replica using the service initialization information.

void IStateProviderReplica.Initialize(StatefulServiceInitializationParameters initializationParameters)Sub Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.IStateProviderReplica.Initialize(initializationParameters As StatefulServiceInitializationParameters) Implements IStateProviderReplica.Initialize
Parameters
initializationParameters
StatefulServiceInitializationParameters StatefulServiceInitializationParameters

Service initialization information such as service name, partition id, replica id, and code package information.

Remarks

No complex processing should be done during Initialize. Expensive or long-running initialization should be done in OpenAsync.

IStateProviderReplica.OpenAsync(ReplicaOpenMode, IStatefulServicePartition, CancellationToken) Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.IStateProviderReplica.OpenAsync(ReplicaOpenMode, IStatefulServicePartition, CancellationToken)

Edit

Open the state provider replica for use.

openMode
ReplicaOpenMode ReplicaOpenMode

Indicates whether this is a new or existing replica.

partition
IStatefulServicePartition IStatefulServicePartition

The partition this replica belongs to.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task<IReplicator> Task(Of IReplicator)

Task that represents the asynchronous open operation. The result contains the replicator responsible for replicating state between other state provider replicas in the partition.

Remarks

Extended state provider initialization tasks can be started at this time.
